column4: Can anyone tell me what files I should look at to see if there's anything wrong in them that could be stopping me from loading the gui on the live cd?
did you try safe graphics mode?
try adding noapic to the options on the splash screen...that's what one of my friends had to do for his nvidia card
The noapic line didn't work. I still got the errors. Is there a certain way I'm supposed to use it?
